description: two men in LRC--one standing leaning on walking stick, with a canteen at his belt, other man seated; tall trees with orange leaves

Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

provenance: [Catherine E. Burns, Oakland, CA, until 1999; sold in April for ART, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1999-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)

title: Hikers at a Stop
